text:
is it possible to in dev account edit custom module to use in emails templates?
Thanks!

Hi everyone, Is there a way to get the labels of a choice field within a module? I'm building a module that has a dropdown option and I want to be able to code the labels from the choice field and have them pre-populate within the drop-down, is this possible?  I am hoping that I can avoid having to hard coding the choice fields the if possible, especially if a new choice field is added. Thank you
Hi There!! Im new to the Slack channel.. Is there a fairly simple way to make a lightbox/modal popup for an array of buttons in a module?
Update: I made the modal, but for some reason its pulling content from a few sections up... Totally different module though
does it matter that it also uses some of the same html?? I used different field names though so i dont understand
